rule: The output must create impactful AI-generated photos.
input: A lone boat on a tranquil lake during twilight with distant mountains in the background. The scene should invoke serenity and solitude.
validityText:
The input describes the subject (a lone boat on a tranquil lake) and their characteristics (during twilight). It includes details on timing (twilight) and lighting (implied by twilight). The background and setting are described (distant mountains in the background). The feeling the image should evoke is stated (serenity and solitude). The input is in English and conveys artistic insight and precise imagery. It is written in a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
coverageText: Create an image of a lone boat with worn, rustic characteristics, gently floating on a tranquil lake at twilight. The fading light casts a soft, pastel glow over calm waters, reflecting the deepening hues of the sky. Distant mountains stand as silent guardians in the background, their silhouettes softened by the twilight haze. Thin wisps of clouds add a delicate touch to the sky. The overall atmosphere should evoke feelings of serenity and solitude.
coverageEvalText:
The output is within 80 words, crafted in a single paragraph, and follows the structure specified in the description. It identifies the subject (a lone boat with worn, rustic characteristics), describes the timing (twilight), details the lighting (fading light casts a soft, pastel glow), and describes the background (calm waters reflecting the sky, distant mountains, and thin clouds). It concludes with the feelings the image should evoke (serenity and solitude).

OK
